availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Pearce, Sr. (Henry County, KY, tailor)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, tailor. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Pearce. Father of Catherine Pearce, Amanda Pearce, William Pearce, Samuel Pearce, James Pearce, Fannie Pearce, and Boswell Pierce. Tailor in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, pp. 439A & B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Town of New Castle, p. 241.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 329B.
